prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: He has worked on scientific projects for the Czech Ornithological Society and is actively involved in the tech community. Pavol gives lectures at conferences, serves as a jury member, and mentors in various competitions, both in the Czech Republic and internationally.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Tech Expert and Bird Science Advocate
